subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:

Bill and Hillary Clinton liquidated the contents of their blind trust that could prove to be embarrassing to her presidential campaign.

Toddler survives wild ride
A 3-year-old girl survives a ride on top of the camper on her dad's pickup truck. WXIA's Catherine Kim reports.
